name: childhood leukemia
definition: A leukemia that occurs in children. [url:http\://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/leukemiachildhood.html]

clinicalTrials.title: Phase I Study of Bevacizumab and Sorafenib Combined With Low Dose Cyclophosphamide in Patients With Refractory Solid Tumors and Leukemia
